original_title: わいせつ覗き 見せたがる女
overview: Nakamoto, who works at a real estate agency, enters a vacant apartment without permission and begins to peep into it. By chance, he finds an apartment building where a TV reporter lives, and eventually starts playing pranks on the phone. One day, the woman comes to Nakamoto's real estate store as a customer .......
title: Indecent Peeping: A Woman Who Wants to Be Seen
